ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a cost X or less opposing creature, and destroy it, where X is the number of your black creatures.

name: Sinister Festering Stringman
flavor: He has built up a larger following in death.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, return it to your hand.

name: Succubus of Deception
flavor: There is something weird about her charm?
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay [2] to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
Deadly (When this creature deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature.)
[AUTO] When a creature at this fort is destroyed during your opponent's turn, if this card is an ambush, you may summon this creature.

name: Bloody Baroness
flavor: Enthralled by her beauty, many men have willingly given up their blood.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a cost 4 or less creature, and destroy it.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Blue)This creature gets +2/+2.

name: Flesh Shredder
flavor: Shredding' has a whole new meaning now.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, your opponent discards two cards.

name: Baltheos, Devourer of Hope
flavor: It revels in decay.
ability:
Assassin <Yellow> (This creature may attack opposing yellow creatures in [REST]. That attack cannot be blocked by [Dragoshield] or creatures.)
[AUTO] When this creature is [Dragocross](Any), you may choose a yellow creature, and [REST] it

name: Cavalier Nosferatu
flavor: All lesser beings exist to sate his hunger.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a creature from your discard pile, and return it to your hand. If you do, discard a card from your hand.

name: Soul of the Lost
flavor: "My darling? where did you go to?"

name: Death Metal Rotter
flavor: He wants to one day be a legendary rock zombie that everyone remembers.

name: Grave Champion
flavor: No, it wasn't just a flesh wound.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, each player destroys one of their creatures.

name: Bass Wrecker
flavor: Gets the crowd riled up every time.

name: Lilith's Charmer
flavor: "Come to me~"

name: Mindflayer Demon
flavor: The mind is more vulnerable than the body.
ability:
Assassin <Green>(This creature may attack opposing green creatures in [REST]. That attack cannot be blocked by [Dragoshield] or creatures.)
[CONT] [Dragocross](Red)This creature gets +2/+1.

name: Rattlebone Fighter
flavor: Even in death, he still serves.

name: Wandering Apparition
flavor: Cursed to haunt the world, tormented by regret.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is blocked by a [Dragoshield], it gets +2/+0 for this turn.

name: Offering of Souls
flavor: What are you willing to give in return?
ability: As part of the cost to play this spell, put all of your non-black dice into your discard pile, discard your hand, and destroy all of your barriers, creatures, and ambushes. You cannot lose the game until the start of your opponent's next turn. Draw 5 cards, and all creatures and spells in your hand cost 0 for this turn. At the start of your opponent's next draw step, you lose the game.

name: Gluttony of Albert
flavor: When presented with something he hasn't consumed, Albert's true form becomes apparent.
ability:
Choose an opposing fort, and destroy all creatures at that fort.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into the discard pile, choose an opposing creature, and destroy it. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Death and Decay
flavor: Cruelty beyond words.
ability:
Destroy all cost 2 or less creatures.
[Dice 6](Black)Destroy all cost 3 or less creatures instead.

name: Death Trap
flavor: Watch your step.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay [2] to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may choose an attacking creature, and destroy it. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Adraste's Disdain
flavor: "You're annoying, so you'll have to go~"
ability:
Choose a [Dragocross](Any)creature, and destroy it.
[Dice 4-6](Black)Then, if a creature was destroyed with this effect, you may choose a [Dragoshield], and destroy it.

name: Despair
flavor: Destroying a person's mind is far more fun to watch than destroying his body.
ability:
As part of the cost to play this spell, Siphon 1. Your opponent discards a card at random. (To Siphon 1, choose one of your dice, and reduce its value by 1.)
[Fort Burst] Play this card without paying the cost. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Althaine, Exemplar of Vashr
flavor: "It is our sworn duty to right all evil."

name: Laelania, Keeper of Vashr
flavor: "We must rise to protect life."

name: Linx, Savant of Vashr
flavor: "Excellent! This war will yield valuable data."

name: Grousk, Warmonger of Vashr
flavor: "The time for war has come... SLAY THEM ALL!"

name: Adraste, Hellion of Vashr
flavor: "How boring. I shall show them true chaos."
